author: cnbc.com
title: Cohu to Announce Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017 Results on February 15
text:
POWAY, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Cohu, Inc. (NASDAQ: COHU), a leading supplier of semiconductor equipment, will release its fourth quarter and full year 2017 financial results on Thursday, February 15, 2018 following the close of market at 1:00 p.m. Pacific Time/4:00 p.m. Eastern Time.
The company will host a live conference call and webcast to discuss the fourth quarter and full year 2017 results at 1:30 p.m. Pacific Time/4:30 p.m. Eastern Time. Interested investors and analysts are invited to dial into the conference call by using 877-407-8031 (domestic) or 201-689-8031 (international). Webcast access is available on the Investor Information section of the company’s website at www.cohu.com .
The teleconference replay will be available through March 15, 2018. The replay dial-in number is 877-481-4010 (domestic) or 919-882-2331 (international) using passcode 24464. The webcast replay will be available on the website through February 15, 2019.
About Cohu:
Cohu is a leading supplier of semiconductor test and inspection handlers, micro-electro mechanical system (MEMS) test modules, test contactors and thermal sub-systems used by global semiconductor manufacturers and test subcontractors.
For press releases and other information of interest to investors, please visit Cohu’s website at www.cohu.com .
